data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are both merits and drawbacks of having a large and extended family. One benefit of having a big family is that family members can help out and look after each other. For example, older siblings can help younger siblings with their homework. Another benefit is that there is close family bonding because people who have a big family can enjoy each other’s company. On the other hand, one drawback of having an extended family is that we are less likely to have a personal space because there might be too many family members living in the same house. Therefore, there are both advantages and disadvantages of having a huge family. (111 words)
data.referenceText: What are the advantages and disadvantages of having a large extended family?
data.referenceTranslate: 拥有一个大家庭(几世同堂）的利与弊是什么?
